data.title: Firebird offers Drag Racing seasonally northwest of Eagle, Idaho
data.meta_description: Firebird Raceway is a NHRA Drag Racing facility offering a full season of racing and home of the Boise Roadster Show at Expo Idaho in Boise.
data.text:
Originating in 1968, Firebird Raceway is a quarter-mile drag racing facility that was created to provide family entertainment at an affordable cost. Over the course of over five decades, Firebird has stayed true to that founding principle, as more than fifty events are offered during the April to October drag racing season.

Firebird has been continuously operated by the New family and its staff since its inception. We are proud to be aligned with and a member track of the National Hot Rod Association. All of us at Firebird are dedicated to providing a first-class facility for racers and fans of all ages to enjoy drag racing at its finest. It’s a rather simple notion, but we like to call it the “Firebird Experience”.

We look forward to having you and your family join us this season.
